programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: With Sister Hilda away on a refresher course, Sister Julienne steps in to carry out home visits. The new Pupil Midwives settle in. An overly protective mother struggles to cope with her daughter's teenage pregnancy and frustrates Pupil Midwife Nancy.

programme.title: Masterpiece Mystery!
programme.desc: Will and Geordie investigate an audacious bank robbery, which sees Geordie unexpectedly cross paths with an old friend from his army days.

programme.title: Masterpiece Classic
programme.desc: As Julien and Zsofia investigate controversial politician Kamilla Agoston, Emma finds a lead on Alex's computer that takes her and Julien to a shocking and bloody discovery.

programme.title: Masterpiece Mystery!
programme.desc: A photographer specializing in post-mortem portraits gets menacing messages from beyond the grave. Eliza’s investigation takes her into the spirit world.

programme.title: Halifax: Retribution
programme.desc: As Jane and Zoe try and deal with the shocking truth behind Ben's murder, Jane confronts the shooter as he prepares for a final act - endangering thousands of lives.

programme.desc: Bringing together the brightest minds and freshest voices from across the political spectrum to engage in a contest of ideas about important issues confronting our nation.

programme.title: To the Contrary
programme.desc: This program examines major issues with women of various ethnic and political backgrounds.

programme.title: Austin City Limits
programme.desc: Delight in the throwback country music of Brandy Clark and Charley Crockett. Nashville-based hit songwriter Clark performs cuts from her highly acclaimed Your Life is a Record. Lone Star native Crockett plays tunes from his album Music City U.S.A.

programme.title: Great Performances
programme.desc: Go inside the mind of a genius as host Scott Yoo and fellow musicians undertake a recording of Beethoven's most personal music at a historic Berkshires manor to explore the composer's brilliant career where they are visited by some unexpected guests.
